text: Subramanian Raja Krishnamoorthi"Schneider returns to House; Krishnamoorthi takes Duckworth's seat ". ( born July 19, 1973) is an Indian-born American businessman and politician. He is the U.S. Representative for since 2017. He was elected to replace Tammy Duckworth, who gave up the seat to successfully run for the U.S. Senate. Krishnamoorthi is a member of the Democratic Party. In May 2025, Krishnamoorthi announced that he would run for the United States Senate seat being vacated by Dick Durbin in the 2026 election. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Politicians from Buffalo, New York Category:Businesspeople from Buffalo, New York Category:Businesspeople from Illinois Category:Politicians from Peoria, Illinois Category:Politicians from New Delhi Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Raja Krishnamoorthi
